summary: The diff implements all four requirements: design code normalization (REQ-1), correct Master Design Excel column parsing (REQ-2), automatic order updates on Master Design upload (REQ-3), and confirmation messages with mapping counts (REQ-4). All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the code changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) with full state structure definition
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention creating a migration system or module. This appears to be infrastructure work not requested in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Progress tracking with percentage display during Excel upload
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4 only requests confirmation messages showing counts after upload completes. Progress bars during upload were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Chunked processing of Excel data to prevent UI freezing
hallucinated_features.reason: While this is good engineering practice, the BuildRequest does not specify performance optimizations or chunked processing requirements.
